mhframework.media

Class MHResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhframework.media.MHResourceManager

  • public class MHResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to resource management objects using a variation of the Flyweight Pattern.
    Author:
    Michael Henson

        Loads images from a JAR file.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - The name of the image file to load.
